name: Youtube Lazy Watch Later
description: Adds a video to a watch list without opening the video page and then you can watch the video later in mpv

preferences.name: Add new video to watchlist or subscribe to new channel or playlist
preferences.description: To add a playlist write after a the playlist id, otherwise send the url for adding a video or subscribing to a channel

preferences.name: Remove video from watchlist or unsubscribe from channel or playlist
Get the last 10 videos of watchlist and choose to watch one of them
Youtube API key
preferences.description: can get one for free from https://console.developers.google.com/apis/credentials, remember to enable the Youtube Data API v3
